install_welcome: Welcome to the Open Game Panel Setup
pear_xxtea_info: Pear Crypt_XXTEA is required for OGP usage. In the most of the Linux distributions this module can be installed with the following Pear command 'pear install Crypt_XXTEA-beta'.
unable_to_write_config: Unable to write to configuration file. Please recheck the write permission.
admin_login_details_info: Now we create admin user for your Open Game Panel.
database_setup_failure: Setup was unable to create the database. Please recheck your database configs.
password_too_short: Your password is too short. It must be at least '%d' characters long.
setup_complete: Setup has been completed successfully. The Open Game Panel is now ready for use.
remove_install_and_secure_config: You should delete install.php from your server and chmod your includes/config.inc.php back to 644 for security purposes.
go_to_panel: Click here to login to your OGP.
unable_to_resolve: If you are unable to resolve this problem please visit OGP website
default_welcome_title_message: Welcome! You can change this title in 'Theme Settings' under the 'Administration' tab.
